links.dtdl:description: The requested information to be returned in segment responses during the processing / execution of this this operations request.
The operations definition reference that corresponds to this operations request.

The associated operations segments reference that corresponds to this operations request. If the operations segment reference is insufficient to identify the operations segment, then the segment requirement should also identify the operations definition reference.

operationsType.title: Operations type
operationsType.description: Describes the category of the activity
operationsType.comment: Required attribute. Possible values are: production, maintenance, quality, inventory, or mixed

oneOf.title: Mixed
oneOf.$comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories of process segments

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: When operation is to be started.

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: When operation is to be completed.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

requestState.title: Request state
requestState.description: Indicates the state of the operations request.
